attributes.action: Do not roll out vaccine / freedom passports in favour of the covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: First, do no harm. It is not known how the vaccine will react with other vaccines routinely given, nor has it been studied for long term effects. The safety of the public is paramount and until all avenues of safety have been fully explored the publish wish to halt plans for freedom passports and mandatory vaccines for travel and other services.
attributes.background: Do not issue vaccine / freedom passports  until long term safety data has been collected independently and the vaccine is confirmed to be completely safe. The vaccine is the first of its kind and long term studies have not been conducted. To force the public to take it without it is inhumane.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

Do not implement Covid-19 Freedom Passes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561818
